subScenes.name: 周末聚会邀请
subScenes.description: 朋友邀你周末聚餐，你有安排要婉拒

qaPairs.speakerText: Hey, we're hitting up that new Italian place this Saturday—you in?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嘿，我们周六去那家新意大利餐厅，来吗？

responses.text: Thanks so much for inviting me! I already have plans that day, but let's catch up next weekend?
responses.text_cn: 谢谢你邀请我！那天我已经有安排了，咱们下周再约？

responses.text: Aw, that sounds awesome, but I'm swamped this weekend. Maybe next time?
responses.text_cn: 听起来太棒了，但这周我忙疯了，下次吧？

qaPairs.usageNote: 用三明治法：感谢+拒绝+改期，更显礼貌

qaPairs.speakerText: C'mon, it'll be fun! You never come out anymore.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 来嘛，肯定好玩！你最近都不出门了。

responses.text: I really miss hanging out with you guys—I promise I'll make it next time. This weekend’s just not possible.
responses.text_cn: 我真的想和你们聚，这次真不行，下次一定！

responses.text: I know, I’ve been a ghost lately. But I’m recharging at home this weekend—thanks for getting me!
responses.text_cn: 我知道我最近消失太多，这周想在家休息，谢啦！

qaPairs.usageNote: 回应时加入情感共鸣，减轻拒绝感

subScenes.name: 同事聚餐邀约
subScenes.description: 同事邀请参加下班后聚餐，你有事推辞

qaPairs.speakerText: We're grabbing drinks after work—join us? Everyone’s going!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 下班后一起去喝一杯？大家都去！

responses.text: That sounds like so much fun! I’ve got a doctor’s appointment, but I’d love to join next time!
responses.text_cn: 听起来太棒了！我有预约，下次一定参加！

responses.text: Ugh, I wish I could! But I’ve got family dinner tonight. You guys have fun!
responses.text_cn: 真想参加！但今晚要陪家人，你们玩得开心！

qaPairs.usageNote: 用具体理由增强可信度，避免敷衍

qaPairs.speakerText: Come on, it’s just one drink—you always say no!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 来嘛，就一杯，你每次都拒绝！

responses.text: I know I’ve been a party pooper lately—I’m working on it! Let me treat you all next Friday?
responses.text_cn: 我知道我最近扫兴，我在改！下周五我请你们？

responses.text: Haha, guilty! But I’m trying to cut back this month. Appreciate the invite!
responses.text_cn: 哈哈，我认了！这个月在戒酒，谢谢邀请！

qaPairs.usageNote: 用幽默或自我改进表达，软化拒绝

subScenes.name: 朋友邀约旅行
subScenes.description: 朋友提议短途旅行，你预算紧张要婉拒

qaPairs.speakerText: We’re doing a weekend road trip to the mountains—want to come? It’s super cheap!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我们周末去山里自驾游，一起来？超便宜的！

responses.text: That sounds amazing—I’ve been dying to go! But my wallet’s crying this month. Can I join the next one?
responses.text_cn: 太棒了！我超想参加，但这个月钱包在哭，下次能去吗？

responses.text: Oh wow, I love road trips! But I’m broke until payday. Let me know when you plan again!
responses.text_cn: 哇，我超爱自驾游！但要等发薪日，下次记得喊我！

qaPairs.usageNote: 用经济理由+未来期待，保留关系温度

qaPairs.speakerText: Seriously? You always have an excuse!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 真的吗？你每次都找借口！

responses.text: I know, I’m the worst friend for trips right now. But I’m saving up for next season—I’ll be your #1 travel buddy!
responses.text_cn: 我知道我最近最扫兴，但我正在存钱，下季我当你的头号旅伴！

responses.text: Haha, fair point! I’m just being extra careful this year. But I’ll bring snacks next time!
responses.text_cn: 哈哈，说得对！今年我特别谨慎，下次我带零食！

qaPairs.usageNote: 用自嘲+承诺未来，化解对方情绪
